trans-unit.source: Install and use Giraph on Hadoop clusters in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Install and use Giraph on Hadoop clusters in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to customize HDInsight cluster with Giraph, and how to use Giraph.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to customize HDInsight cluster with Giraph, and how to use Giraph.

trans-unit.source: Install and use Giraph in HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Install and use Giraph in HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Learn how to customize Windows based HDInsight cluster with Giraph using Script Action, and how to use Giraph to process large-scale graphs.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to customize Windows based HDInsight cluster with Giraph using Script Action, and how to use Giraph to process large-scale graphs.

trans-unit.source: For information on using Giraph with a Linux-based cluster, see [Install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install-linux.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on using Giraph with a Linux-based cluster, see [Install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install-linux.md).

trans-unit.source: You can install Giraph on any type of cluster (Hadoop, Storm, HBase, Spark) on Azure HDInsight by using *Script Action*.
trans-unit.target: You can install Giraph on any type of cluster (Hadoop, Storm, HBase, Spark) on Azure HDInsight by using *Script Action*.

trans-unit.source: A sample script to install Giraph on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: A sample script to install Giraph on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).

trans-unit.source: The sample script works only with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.
trans-unit.target: The sample script works only with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.

trans-unit.source: For more information on HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).

trans-unit.source: **Related articles**
trans-unit.target: **Related articles**

trans-unit.source: [Install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install-linux.md)
trans-unit.target: [Install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install-linux.md)

trans-unit.source: [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md): general information on creating HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md): general information on creating HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: [Customize HDInsight cluster using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize]: general information on customizing HDInsight clusters using Script Action.
trans-unit.target: [Customize HDInsight cluster using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize]: general information on customizing HDInsight clusters using Script Action.

trans-unit.source: [Develop Script Action scripts for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md).
trans-unit.target: [Develop Script Action scripts for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md).

trans-unit.source: What is Giraph?
trans-unit.target: What is Giraph?

trans-unit.source: Apache Giraph
trans-unit.target: Apache Giraph

trans-unit.source: allows you to perform graph processing by using Hadoop, and can be used with Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: allows you to perform graph processing by using Hadoop, and can be used with Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Graphs model relationships between objects, such as the connections between routers on a large network like the Internet, or relationships between people on social networks (sometimes referred to as a social graph).
trans-unit.target: Graphs model relationships between objects, such as the connections between routers on a large network like the Internet, or relationships between people on social networks (sometimes referred to as a social graph).

trans-unit.source: Graph processing allows you to reason about the relationships between objects in a graph, such as:
trans-unit.target: Graph processing allows you to reason about the relationships between objects in a graph, such as:

trans-unit.source: Identifying potential friends based on your current relationships.
trans-unit.target: Identifying potential friends based on your current relationships.

trans-unit.source: Identifying the shortest route between two computers in a network.
trans-unit.target: Identifying the shortest route between two computers in a network.

trans-unit.source: Calculating the page rank of webpages.
trans-unit.target: Calculating the page rank of webpages.

trans-unit.source: Install Giraph using portal
trans-unit.target: Install Giraph using portal

trans-unit.source: [Install Giraph on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install-v1.md)
trans-unit.target: [Install Giraph on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install-v1.md)

trans-unit.source: Start creating a cluster by using the **CUSTOM CREATE** option, as described at [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#portal).
trans-unit.target: Start creating a cluster by using the **CUSTOM CREATE** option, as described at [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#portal).

trans-unit.source: On the **Script Actions** page of the wizard, click **add script action** to provide details about the script action, as shown below:
trans-unit.target: On the **Script Actions** page of the wizard, click **add script action** to provide details about the script action, as shown below:

trans-unit.source: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install/hdi-script-action-giraph.png "Use Script Action to customize a cluster")
trans-unit.target: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install/hdi-script-action-giraph.png "Use Script Action to customize a cluster")

trans-unit.source:
PropertyValue
Name Specify a name for the script action.
trans-unit.target:
PropertyValue
Name Specify a name for the script action.

trans-unit.source: For example, Install Giraph. Script URI Specify the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster.
trans-unit.target: For example, Install Giraph. Script URI Specify the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster.

trans-unit.source: For example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1 Node Type Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.
trans-unit.target: For example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1 Node Type Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.

trans-unit.source: You can choose All nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.
trans-unit.target: You can choose All nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.

trans-unit.source: Parameters Specify the parameters, if required by the script.
trans-unit.target: Parameters Specify the parameters, if required by the script.

trans-unit.source: The script to install Giraph does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.
trans-unit.target: The script to install Giraph does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.

trans-unit.source: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: After you have added the scripts, click the checkmark to start creating the cluster.
trans-unit.target: After you have added the scripts, click the checkmark to start creating the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Use Giraph
trans-unit.target: Use Giraph

trans-unit.source: We use the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example to demonstrate the basic
trans-unit.target: We use the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example to demonstrate the basic

trans-unit.source: Pregel
trans-unit.target: Pregel

trans-unit.source: implementation for finding the shortest path between objects in a graph.
trans-unit.target: implementation for finding the shortest path between objects in a graph.

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to upload the sample data and the sample jar, run a job by using the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example, and then view the results.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to upload the sample data and the sample jar, run a job by using the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example, and then view the results.

trans-unit.source: Upload a sample data file to Azure Blob storage.
trans-unit.target: Upload a sample data file to Azure Blob storage.

trans-unit.source: On your local workstation, create a new file named **tiny_graph.txt**.
trans-unit.target: On your local workstation, create a new file named **tiny_graph.txt**.

trans-unit.source: It should contain the following lines:
trans-unit.target: It should contain the following lines:

trans-unit.source: Upload the tiny_graph.txt file to the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Upload the tiny_graph.txt file to the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to upload data, see [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to upload data, see [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).

trans-unit.source: This data describes a relationship between objects in a directed graph, by using the format [source\_id, source\_value,[[dest\_id], [edge\_value],...]].
trans-unit.target: This data describes a relationship between objects in a directed graph, by using the format [source\_id, source\_value,[[dest\_id], [edge\_value],...]].

trans-unit.source: Each line represents a relationship between a **source\_id** object and one or more **dest\_id** objects.
trans-unit.target: Each line represents a relationship between a **source\_id** object and one or more **dest\_id** objects.

trans-unit.source: The **edge\_value** (or weight) can be thought of as the strength or distance of the connection between **source_id** and **dest\_id**.
trans-unit.target: The **edge\_value** (or weight) can be thought of as the strength or distance of the connection between **source_id** and **dest\_id**.

trans-unit.source: Drawn out, and using the value (or weight) as the distance between objects, the above data might look like this:
trans-unit.target: Drawn out, and using the value (or weight) as the distance between objects, the above data might look like this:

trans-unit.source: ![tiny_graph.txt drawn as circles with lines of varying distance between](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install/giraph-graph.png)
trans-unit.target: ![tiny_graph.txt drawn as circles with lines of varying distance between](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-giraph-install/giraph-graph.png)

trans-unit.source: Run the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example.
trans-unit.target: Run the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example.

trans-unit.source: Use the following Azure PowerShell cmdlets to run the example by using the tiny_graph.txt file as input.
trans-unit.target: Use the following Azure PowerShell cmdlets to run the example by using the tiny_graph.txt file as input.

trans-unit.source: This requires that you have installed and configured [Azure PowerShell][powershell-install].
trans-unit.target: This requires that you have installed and configured [Azure PowerShell][powershell-install].

trans-unit.source: In the above example, replace **clustername** with the name of your HDInsight cluster that has Giraph installed.
trans-unit.target: In the above example, replace **clustername** with the name of your HDInsight cluster that has Giraph installed.

trans-unit.source: View the results.
trans-unit.target: View the results.

trans-unit.source: Once the job has finished, the results will be stored in two output files in the __wasb:///example/out/shotestpaths__ folder.
trans-unit.target: Once the job has finished, the results will be stored in two output files in the __wasb:///example/out/shotestpaths__ folder.

trans-unit.source: The files are called __part-m-00001__ and __part-m-00002__.
trans-unit.target: The files are called __part-m-00001__ and __part-m-00002__.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to download and view the output:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to download and view the output:

trans-unit.source: This will create the __example/output/shortestpaths__ directory structure in the current directory on your workstation, and download the two output files to that location.
trans-unit.target: This will create the __example/output/shortestpaths__ directory structure in the current directory on your workstation, and download the two output files to that location.

trans-unit.source: Use the __Cat__ cmdlet to display the contents of the files:
trans-unit.target: Use the __Cat__ cmdlet to display the contents of the files:

trans-unit.source: The output should appear similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: The output should appear similar to the following:

trans-unit.source: Install Giraph using Aure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Install Giraph using Aure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_powershell).

trans-unit.source: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).

trans-unit.source: Install Giraph using .NET SDK
trans-unit.target: Install Giraph using .NET SDK

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_azure_powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_azure_powershell).

trans-unit.source: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using the .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using the .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).
